content: his crochet mouse pattern is a great project for crochet beginners crochet a very cute amigurumi mouse with this easy and fast to make crochet pattern it will be a great addition to your crochet animals collection the crochet pattern is written in english us terms the pattern includes detailed instructions pictures and link to full length video tutorial so crocheting will be easy and fun size of the finished toy about 1 57 inches 4 cm long without a tail with cotton yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook tip you can use the same pattern to make larger or smaller toys by using finer or bulkier yarn pick a crochet hook at least a size smaller than suggested on yarn label and crochet tightly enough to achieve a tight gauge that will not allow the stuffing to show through the fabric difficulty easy suitable for a beginner you will learn how to make cs chain stitch uk=chain magic_ring magic_ring uk=magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet uk=double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch uk=slip stich increase increase in single_crochet uk=increase in double_crochet decrease decrease in single_crochet uk=decrease in double_crochet supplies - 2 5 mm crochet hook - yarn yarnart jeans - scissors stitch marker /scrap piece of yarn - black embroidery thread needle - polyester fiberfill stuffing about this pattern is for personal use only you do not have permission to recopy rewrite or redistribute this pattern in any form as your own or otherwise you may not resell my patterns but you are welcome to sell any of the items made from my patterns
